basic.description: This course covers fundamental concepts of immunology, immunopathology and neoplasia. The course integrates knowledge from across the traditional disciplines in basic, behavioral and clinical sciences and applies that knowledge in understanding and treating patients.
basic.subject: BMS
basic.title: Medicine 3 Human Systems in Health and Disease: Host-Defense

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Matriculation to FSU College of Medicine MD program.
